title: Karen Read’s lawsuit against investigators, witnesses alleging cover-up moves to federal court
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Crime The lawsuit, filed by Read against investigators, the McCabes, the Alberts, and Brian Higgins, was filed in federal court Tuesday.
Karen Read listens to the cross examination by Robert Alessi of expert accident witness Dr.
Judson Welcher during her retrial at Norfolk Superior Court, Wednesday May 28, 2025, in Dedham, Mass.

title: John Kerry knighted in England by King Charles for climate change efforts
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Politics The diplomat, who served as Biden’s climate envoy, was bestowed the award for “services to tackling climate change.
” Kerry was bestowed the award for his contributions to tackling climate change.

David Hansen/Salve Regina University Former US Secretary of State John Kerry was knighted Wednesday by King Charles III, receiving England’s highest honor in a closed-door reception at Buckingham Palace.

title: Several suspects facing charges after police recover meth, cocaine in Roslindale drug bust
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The suspects were arrested after police searched a Roslindale apartment and found a kilogram each of meth and cocaine.
Police recovered over 1,000 grams each of methamphetamine and pink cocaine in the drug bust Monday.
Boston Police Department Boston police arrested four suspects Monday and recovered two kilograms of methamphetamine and cocaine in connection with a drug investigation in Roslindale.
